bibl.title: P. Naqlun Inv. 35/88, a Papyrus from the Recently Excavated Monastic Centre in the Fayyum Oasis.
bibl.note: Polish Archaeological Mission in Deir al-Naqlun, 1988. Γνῶσις εἰδῶν, i.e. a list of products written for someone who is titled δεσπότης καὶ πατήρ. All the products may have constituted the ingredients of a meal prepared by the monks. Second half of the 6th cent.-first half of the 7th cent. A.D.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: DERDA Tomasz, P. Naqlun Inv. 35/88, a Papyrus from the Recently Excavated Monastic Centre in the Fayyum Oasis.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 603-612, 1 pl.

Polish Archaeological Mission in Deir al-Naqlun, 1988. Γνῶσις εἰδῶν, i.e. a list of products written for someone who is titled δεσπότης καὶ πατήρ. All the products may have constituted the ingredients of a meal prepared by the monks. Second half of the 6th cent.-first half of the 7th cent. A.D.
